info.title: Intuety API
info.description:
## Typescript Node.JS REST API Server, leveraging TypeORM. 
 ### Key conventions: 
- RESTful conventions should be observed wherever possible
- Paths are in camelCase
- JSON body parameters should be in camelCase

get.description: Retrieve metrics for a specific project. Requires api authentication.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for the metrics

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for the metrics

get.summary: Get projects metrics for a client
get.description: Retrieve metrics for all projects of a specific client. Requires api authentication.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for the metrics

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for the metrics

post.description: This endpoint retrieves risk assessments for the provided input criteria

startDate.description: The start date of the risk assessments in ISO8601 format

endDate.description: The end date of the risk assessments in ISO8601 format

output.description: The designed output format. Accepts 'json' or 'csv'. Default output is JSON when not specified.

count.description: The number of risk assessments returned

post.description: Endpoint to fetch reviews metrics based on provided parameters

riskAssessmentId.description: The ID of the risk assessment

startDate.description: The start date of the reviews in ISO8601 format

endDate.description: The end date of the reviews in ISO8601 format

output.description: The designed output format. Accepts 'json' or 'csv'. Default output is JSON when not specified.

post.description: Endpoint to get requested reviewers metrics.

output.description: The designed output format. Accepts 'json' or 'csv'. Default output is JSON when not specified.

200.description: A list of requested reviewers metrics

count.description: The number of requested reviewers returned

400.description: Invalid input, error message is returned.
